alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Gulf; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 22 at 12:23PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM EST/1230 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Big Bend Florida and Panhandle Florida, including the following counties, in Big Bend Florida, Franklin, Liberty and Wakulla. In Panhandle Florida, Gulf. * WHEN...Until 130 PM EST /1230 PM CST/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1223 PM EST /1123 AM CST/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen in the last 2 Hours. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Port St. Joe, Fort Gadsden, Buck Siding, Beverly, Sumatra, Hays Place, Howard Creek, Willis Landing, Owens Bridge, Morgan Place, Odena, Poplar Camp, Sanborn, Ward Ridge, Jones Homestead and Simmons Bayou. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
